subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The former Liberty star Becky Hammon scored 23 of her season-high 30 points in the second half to lead the visiting San Antonio Silver Stars to an 82-76 victory against her former W.N.B.A. team. Shameka Christon and Jessica Davenport scored 15 points each for the Liberty (18-13).
